nodes.text: North Hollywood was a destination on the subtram in the Coruscant Underworld. It was listed on travel maps inside the subtram trains, along with Sunset, Valley Village, Beverly Blvd, Burbank, Lucasville,LAAC, Filoniville, Laurel Canyon, Couch House, Skinwalker, RGC, Letterman, Skywalker Ranch, Big Rock Ranch and Skinwalker Ranch.

North Hollywood was inserted onto a subtram map as an in-joke by the Star Wars: The Clone Wars production team along with the other destinations on the map, referencing the
the district North Hollywood in the San Fernando Valley region of Los Angeles, California.
